    • Field Detail

      • color

        @Option
public String color
        The line color.

      • dash$enum

        @Option(value="dash")
public DashStyleEnum dash$enum
        The dash style of lines.

        Default: SOLID

      • dash$string

        @Option(value="dash")
public String dash$string
        An alternative in the form of a dash length list in px (eg "5px,10px,2px,2px").

      • shape

        @Option
public LineOptions.ShapeEnum shape
        Determines the line shape. With "spline" the lines are drawn using spline interpolation. The other available values correspond to step-wise line shapes.

      • simplify

        @Option
public Boolean simplify
        Simplifies lines by removing nearly-collinear points. When transitioning lines, it may be desirable to disable this so that the number of points along the resulting SVG path is unaffected.

        Default: true

      • smoothing

        @Option
public Double smoothing
        The amount of smoothing. 0 corresponds to no smoothing (equivalent to a "linear" shape).

        Default: 1

      • width

        @Option
public Integer width
        The line width (in px).

        Default: 2

    • Constructor Detail

      • LineOptions

        public LineOptions()
